name: Literally an RPG
description:
Self-demonstrating description of the downloadable game in which the player controls a party of adventurers who are insanely overpowered and have already done all the sidequests.

Game includes action, drama, romance, and money, all in the span of a few miraculous minutes!

(A ridiculously short RPG experience used as a test for my bigger project, which will be much more in-depth and polished. Nevertheless, I hope someone can get a laugh out of this!)
